protein.specific_function: Able to isomerize both 3-cis and 3-trans double bonds into the 2-trans form in a range of enoyl-CoA species. Has a preference for 3-trans substrates (By similarity).

reference.reference_text: Suk K, Kim YH, Hwang DY, Ihm SH, Yoo HJ, Lee MS: Molecular cloning and expression of a novel human cDNA related to the diazepam binding inhibitor. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1999 May 31;1454(1):126-31.
